alert.note: Alert for Grand and Battlement Mesas; Southwest San Juan Mountains; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 4:03AM MST until February 24 at 4:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow in between lighter lulls will be possible during this long term snow event. Widespread snow accumulations of 14 to 24 inches will be possible with localized amount nearing 3 feet. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph at times. * WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas, West Elk and Sawatch Mountains and Southwest San Juan Mountains. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Grand and Battlement Mesas; Southwest San Juan Mountains; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
